text: RE: Microsoft stop messing with my people's task bar settings. I have seen people with PSTs in [My] Documents where OneDrive valiantly tries to back up the PST. One last week was marked as an error (2x 20-30 GB files) but another a couple years back was small enough to try and would upload the PST for hours, so Outlook couldn’t access the file. I haven’t seen a PST be lost though. (also had a client once who backed up their 30 GB PST via one of the online backup services, Carbonite or something, same issue) ---- Steve Yates ITS, Inc. %40SN6PR08MB5517.namprd08.prod.outlook.com

metadata.topic: RE: Microsoft stop messing with my people's task bar settings.
